about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in an action-packed low-poly adventure where you take on the role of a warrior fighting skeletons and monsters in an expansive open world. With smooth combat mechanics, the game features a variety of attacks, double jumps, and strategic stamina management. As you explore, you’ll unlock new areas, face challenging enemies, and survive intense battles. Whether you’re a fan of sword fighting or fast-paced action, this game has something for you.
Key Features:
-Open World: Explore vast landscapes filled with hidden dangers and treasures.
-Dynamic Combat: Use a combination of sword strikes, dodges, and special moves to defeat enemies.
-Stamina Management: Keep an eye on your stamina bar to avoid getting overwhelmed.
-Double Jump: Gain an advantage with agile double jumps to outmaneuver foes.
-Engaging Animations: Enjoy smooth, responsive animations that enhance the fighting experience.
-Health System: Manage your HP while battling relentless enemies.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (20H1 version or newer, 64-bit versions)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or Intel Core i5-2500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R9 Fury or GeForce GTX 750 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 FPS, 1920x1080 in low
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (20H1 version or newer, 64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 1300X or Core i5-11300H
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 6500 XT or GeForce RTX 3050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended, 60 FPS, 1920x1080 in high
